title: When transfering data from one from to another, the new phone is stuck on "getting ready to copy".
content: My old phone is an LG Stylo.  I am trying to transfer data to my new Google Pixel 2.  I'm using the provided switch plug and followed prompts, but the Pixel is stuck on "getting ready to copy" and not providing prompts to choose what to copy.  Any ideas of why it is stuck?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
